courses.title: HTML for Beginners
courses.description: Learn the basics of HTML to build your first web page.
what_will_learn: Create forms and tables in HTML
requirements: Text editor (like VS Code or Sublime Text)

courses.title: CSS Mastery
courses.description: Master CSS to create stunning web designs.
what_will_learn: Master the box model and positioning
Create responsive designs with media queries
Work with CSS preprocessors like SASS
requirements: Text editor (like VS Code or Sublime Text)

courses.title: JavaScript Essentials
courses.description: Learn JavaScript to add interactivity to your web pages.
what_will_learn: Work with variables, data types, and operators
Learn best practices for JavaScript development
requirements: Basic understanding of HTML and CSS
Text editor (like VS Code or Sublime Text)

courses.title: Advanced HTML Techniques
courses.description: Learn advanced HTML techniques for modern web development.
what_will_learn: Create scalable and maintainable HTML structures
requirements: Text editor (like VS Code or Sublime Text)
Enthusiasm to learn advanced web development

courses.title: Responsive Web Design
courses.description: Learn how to create responsive web designs using CSS.
what_will_learn: Understand the principles of responsive design
Use media queries to create adaptable layouts
Master CSS Grid and Flexbox for responsiveness
Optimize images and media for different devices
Test designs on various devices and browsers
requirements: Basic understanding of HTML and CSS
Text editor (like VS Code or Sublime Text)

courses.title: Learn Python for Data Science
courses.description: Master Python programming for data analysis and visualization.
what_will_learn: Work with data structures and libraries
Visualize data with Matplotlib and Seaborn
requirements: Text editor or IDE (like PyCharm or Jupyter)

courses.title: Data Science with Pandas
courses.description: Learn how to manipulate and analyze data using Pandas.
what_will_learn: Visualize data with Pandas and Matplotlib

courses.description: An introduction to machine learning concepts and algorithms.
